Name: Restaurant 212
Review Text: An amazing dining experience. Really unique to be sitting, pretty much, in the kitchen. Respect for how ALL the team works and prepares the food. The service is also very personal and efficient. Only had one issue...the toilets were not clean, and the odors on the way to them could/should be improved.  Definitely will be back !

Name: Restaurant 212
Review Text: Simply amazing: the food, the wines, the service, the atmosphere. Go and get the experience, it is so well worth it! High end cooking in a relaxed setting. Watch out for your cutlery!

Name: Restaurant 212
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic restaurant, with beautiful setup,  oriented around an open kitchen. The 8 course tasting menu was excellent, with good wine pairing.  The entrance is nicely shielded so even the seats close to it are perfectly fine. I love how the cutlery is hidden in a drawer in the table.

Review Text: What a beautiful place. Great idea of chef's table experience. Food and combination of ingredients is super great. Pretty sure that they may get second star very soon and wish them huge success! A place worth numerous visits!

Name: Restaurant 212
Review Text: It‚Äôs definitely a special experience. Make a reservation ahead of time, as they get filled up very fast. Or drop in before the peak time, like we did. The food is absolutely exquisite state-of-the-art. Outstanding service and atmosphere with great vibes.

Name: Restaurant 212
Review Text: For fine dining food with a casual and easy ambience, this place hits the spot. We went and did the full Monty, we said yes to everything they offered. Wine pairing, yes; cheese, omakase please; special port, ok; coffee and sweets, sure. ‚Ä¶
